Alice goes into the theater. she finds a seat and watches the movie for a while. she becomes bored and so she looks around at the others in the theater.
She sees the nice young couple sitting in the row in front of her. Alice watches so she can learn from them. She tries to find out what they are talking about. She thinks its funny when they look at their watches and then look at each other in confusion and then look at their watches again.
Alice can't focus on the movie for thinking about her new friend's likes and dislikes. Eventually the young couple stands up and leaves the theater. This really gets Alice going.
The movie now looks pretty pointless to her. She thinks to herself that she can improve on it. She turns to the man standing next to her and asks; "what was that all about?"
The man is confused by this question. So he explains to Alice that those people were rebels and had just stolen some money from a shop. This shocks Alice. She女自cology 1010 expected something better than that.
Alice continues to watch the movie. She no longer finds anything interesting about it. she looks over at the man next to her. He's getting worked up in his seat. She says: "what's the big deal?"
The man explains to her that this was the best scene in the whole movie. In fact it was more exciting than all the battles in the other three films put together. Alice still doesn't get it. She moves around in her chair and makes loud comments during various scenes.
After the movie is over Alice returns the man's ticket and they say good night.
